summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Reports Module with Financial, Player, Game reports, Schedules, and Export Center. Fixed routing issue and verified all functionality.

design_issues.issue: App.js was importing Reports from Modules.jsx instead of Reports.jsx
design_issues.fix_applied: Updated import to use correct Reports component

passed_tests: Reports Overview - KPI Data (GGR: $16,200.50, NGR: $8,770.40, Active Players: 124)
Financial Report - Daily Data (2 records with proper structure)
Player LTV Report (2 player records with deposits, withdrawals, net revenue, VIP levels)
Game Performance Report (2 game records with bets, wins, GGR data)
Report Schedules - Get and Create (empty initial state, successful creation)
Export Jobs - Get and Create (successful export job creation with download URL)
Report Audit (1 audit record with admin action tracking)
Frontend Navigation - All report sections accessible via sidebar
Frontend Data Display - Tables showing correct data structure
Export Functionality - Download PDF Report button working
Backend API Integration - All endpoints returning proper data

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 10 Reports API endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All 6 report sections (Overview, Financial, Players, Games, Scheduled, Export Center) working correctly
